title: Plant Care
description: Helps users manage and track plant care routines with reminders and notes.
challenges: Implementing reliable reminders and syncing data between client and server.
futurePlans: Add AI-powered plant disease detection and personalized care tips.

title: Food Tracker
description: A production-ready food management app featuring real-time synchronization, JWT authentication, and optimized performance.
challenges: Handling real-time data sync and optimizing performance under heavy load.
futurePlans: Integrate AI-based food recommendations and expand recipe database.

title: Duranta Online
description: Duranta Online Limited is a modern web application built with Next.js (App Router), React, and Tailwind CSS. It provides high-speed internet and cable services with a responsive UI, a support center, and an admin dashboard for managing plans, teams, and user notifications.
features: Responsive landing page with animated gradient banner
mooth scroll and WhatsApp contact button
challenges: Implementing secure payment integration and real-time synchronization.
futurePlans: Add multi-player support and analytics dashboard.

title: Active Arena
description: A production-ready play ground management app featuring real-time synchronization, JWT authentication, and optimized performance.
challenges: Implementing secure payment integration and real-time synchronization.
futurePlans: Add multi-player support and analytics dashboard.

title: Event Explorer
description: A full-stack event booking platform where users can browse and reserve seats for local events.
challenges: Managing real-time booking availability and user authentication.
futurePlans: Add event rating system and push notifications.

title: Phudu-Medical-Apoinment-App
description: Phudu Medical is a modern and responsive medical appointment booking web app.
challenges: Creating smooth animated UI and handling booking concurrency.
futurePlans: Integrate doctor availability calendar and SMS reminders.

title: Auction-Gallery
description: A modern React-based application scaffolded with Vite and styled using Tailwind CSS and DaisyUI.
challenges: Implementing real-time bid updates and secure user authentication.
futurePlans: Add push notifications and advanced bidding strategies.

title: Active Arena Server
description: Sports Club Management System (Server) This is the backend server for the Active Arena — a single-club sports management system built with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. It provides RESTful APIs for managing players, coaches, matches, and training sessions.
features: CRUD operations for players, coaches, matches, and training sessions
challenges: Implementing secure payment integration and real-time synchronization.
futurePlans: Add multi-player support and analytics dashboard.

title: Food Garden Server
description: Food Management System (Server) This is the backend server for the Food Garden — a food management system built with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. It provides RESTful APIs for managing food items, categories, and user orders.
features: CRUD operations for food items, categories, and orders
challenges: Handling real-time data sync and optimizing performance under heavy load.
futurePlans: Integrate AI-based food recommendations and expand recipe database.

title: Plant Care Server
description: A robust Node.js backend service for the Plant Care Tracker application, providing RESTful CRUD operations with MongoDB Atlas integration.
challenges: Implementing reliable reminders and syncing data between client and server.
futurePlans: Add AI-powered plant disease detection and personalized care tips.

title: Payooo Mobile
description: A modern and responsive mobile payment web application built with Vanilla JavaScript and Tailwind CSS. It offers a clean UI and smooth user experience for managing digital transactions and payments.
features: Interactive UI built with pure JavaScript
Real-time payment and balance updates (mock data)
Tailwind CSS for fast and consistent styling
challenges: Building dynamic UI interactions using only Vanilla JavaScript without external frameworks.
futurePlans: Integrate a backend API for real payment processing and add user authentication features.

title: Dev Board
description: A static developer dashboard built with raw JavaScript and CSS. It serves as a simple tool hub for quick access to development resources and project links.
features: Built entirely with Vanilla JavaScript and CSS
Static layout optimized for desktop view
Fast performance with zero external dependencies
Easy to customize with basic HTML structure
challenges: Designing a visually appealing and organized layout without using responsive design or frameworks.
futurePlans: Add responsive design support and light/dark theme toggle for better usability.

title: Browse4Pets
description: A responsive pet adoption website built entirely with HTML and Tailwind CSS. It showcases various pet profiles in a visually appealing layout with smooth styling and animations.
features: Built purely with HTML and Tailwind CSS
Fully responsive design for all screen sizes
Clean and minimal pet showcase layout
Optimized for fast loading and accessibility
challenges: Achieving responsive and visually appealing design without using JavaScript or any frameworks.
futurePlans: Add interactive filters and dynamic content loading using JavaScript in future updates.

title: English Janala
description: A fully responsive and interactive educational web application to enhance English vocabulary learning through levels, quizzes, pronunciation, and rich word details — built with HTML, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, and DaisyUI.
features: Word details with definitions, examples and pronunciation (Web Speech API)
Responsive UI built with Tailwind CSS and DaisyUI
SweetAlert2 for friendly alerts and feedback
challenges: Designing an accessible, responsive learning UI while integrating browser APIs (Web Speech) and keeping performance optimal for low-end devices.
futurePlans: Add interactive filters, persistent progress using localStorage or a backend, and dynamic content loading with JavaScript.

title: Kid School
description: A responsive informational site for children’s activities and resources, built with HTML and Tailwind CSS. Focus is on a playful, accessible layout that highlights programs and resources.
features: Responsive design for phones, tablets, and desktops
Smooth hover effects and lightweight animations
challenges: Achieving a playful, accessible design that scales across devices without using JavaScript frameworks.
futurePlans: Add interactive elements (sliders, collapsible FAQ) and minor JS improvements for richer UX.

title: Bangladesh 2.0
description: A static landing page built with semantic HTML and basic CSS, designed to highlight Bangladesh’s culture, innovation, and development vision. It focuses on layout structure and clean visual presentation.
features: Static single-page layout using HTML and CSS
challenges: Maintaining visual consistency and layout balance without using any responsive techniques or frameworks.
futurePlans: Refactor the layout to be fully responsive using Tailwind CSS or CSS Grid for better mobile compatibility.

title: Shiritori-Game-Player
description: A multiplayer Shiritori word game built with React and Vite. Players take turns entering words that must start with the last letter of the previous word; the app validates inputs and tracks scores.
features: Responsive UI built with React + Tailwind
challenges: Handling real-time state and validation for multiplayer turns, ensuring fair scoring, and designing a simple yet responsive UI.
futurePlans: Introduce a backend (Socket.IO) for robust multiplayer support, persistent user accounts, and match-making.
